verses.verse: Jude, <S%G2455><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> of James, <S%G2385><s%> to them that are sanctified <S%G37><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> preserved <S%G5083><s%> in Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and called. <S%G2822><s%>
Mercy <S%G1656><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> be multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> when I gave <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> common <S%G2839><s%> salvation, <S%G4991><s%> it was needful <S%G2192><s%> <S%G318><s%> for me to write <S%G1125><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> and exhort <S%G3870><s%> you that ye should earnestly contend for <S%G1864><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> which was once <S%G530><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> saints. <S%G40><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there are certain <S%G5100><s%> men <S%G444><s%> crept in unawares, <S%G3921><s%> who were before of old ordained <S%G4270><s%> <S%G3819><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> condemnation, <S%G2917><s%> ungodly men, <S%G765><s%> turning <S%G3346><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> lasciviousness, <S%G766><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> denying <S%G720><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> Lord <S%G1203><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I <S%G1161><s%> will <S%G1014><s%> therefore put you in remembrance, <S%G5279><s%> <S%G5209><s%> though ye <S%G5209><s%> once <S%G530><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> how that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> having saved <S%G4982><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt, <S%G125><s%> afterward <S%G1208><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> them that believed <S%G4100><s%> not. <S%G3361><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> which kept <S%G5083><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> first estate, <S%G746><s%> but <S%G235><s%> left <S%G620><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> habitation, <S%G3613><s%> he hath reserved <S%G5083><s%> in everlasting <S%G126><s%> chains <S%G1199><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> darkness <S%G2217><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the judgment <S%G2920><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

Even as <S%G5613><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrah, <S%G1116><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in like manner, <S%G3664><s%> <S%G5158><s%> giving themselves over to fornication, <S%G1608><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> going <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> strange <S%G2087><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> are set forth <S%G4295><s%> for an example, <S%G1164><s%> suffering <S%G5254><s%> the vengeance <S%G1349><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> filthy dreamers <S%G1797><s%> defile <S%G3392><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> <S%G3303><s%> despise <S%G114><s%> dominion, <S%G2963><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> speak evil of <S%G987><s%> dignities. <S%G1391><s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> Michael <S%G3413><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> archangel, <S%G743><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> contending <S%G1252><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1228><s%> he disputed <S%G1256><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> durst <S%G5111><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bring against <S%G2018><s%> him a railing <S%G988><s%> accusation, <S%G2920><s%> but <S%G235><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> thee. <S%G4671><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> speak evil of <S%G987><s%> those things <S%G3745><s%> which they <S%G3303><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> not: <S%G3756><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G3745><s%> they know <S%G1987><s%> naturally, <S%G5447><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> brute <S%G249><s%> beasts, <S%G2226><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those things <S%G5125><s%> they corrupt themselves. <S%G5351><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto them! <S%G846><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> they have gone <S%G4198><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> of Cain, <S%G2535><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ran greedily after <S%G1632><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> error <S%G4106><s%> of Balaam <S%G903><s%> for reward, <S%G3408><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> perished <S%G622><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> gainsaying <S%G485><s%> of Korah. <S%G2879><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> spots <S%G4694><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> feasts of charity, <S%G26><s%> when they feast with <S%G4910><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> feeding <S%G4165><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> without fear: <S%G870><s%> clouds <S%G3507><s%> they are without water, <S%G504><s%> carried about <S%G4064><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> winds; <S%G417><s%> trees <S%G1186><s%> whose fruit withereth, <S%G5352><s%> without fruit, <S%G175><s%> twice <S%G1364><s%> dead, <S%G599><s%> plucked up by the roots; <S%G1610><s%>

Raging <S%G66><s%> waves <S%G2949><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> foaming out <S%G1890><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> shame; <S%G152><s%> wandering <S%G4107><s%> stars, <S%G792><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> is reserved <S%G5083><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blackness <S%G2217><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%> forever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Enoch <S%G1802><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> the seventh <S%G1442><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Adam, <S%G76><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> of these, <S%G5125><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> ten thousands <S%G3461><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%>

To execute <S%G4160><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> upon <S%G2596><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to convince <S%G1827><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that are ungodly <S%G765><s%> among them <S%G846><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their <S%G848><s%> ungodly <S%G763><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have ungodly committed, <S%G764><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their hard <S%G4642><s%> speeches which <S%G3739><s%> ungodly <S%G765><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> murmurers, <S%G1113><s%> complainers, <S%G3202><s%> walking <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G848><s%> lusts; <S%G1939><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G848><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> great swelling <S%G5246><s%> words, having men's persons in admiration <S%G2296><s%> <S%G4383><s%> because of <S%G5484><s%> advantage. <S%G5622><s%>

But, <S%G1161><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> remember <S%G3415><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> which were spoken before <S%G4280><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

How that <S%G3754><s%> they told <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> there should <S%G3754><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> mockers <S%G1703><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> time, <S%G5550><s%> who should walk <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> ungodly <S%G763><s%> lusts. <S%G1939><s%>
These <S%G3778><s%> be <S%G1526><s%> they who separate <S%G592><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> sensual, <S%G5591><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> ye, <S%G5210><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> building up <S%G2026><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> on your <S%G5216><s%> most holy <S%G40><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%>

Keep <S%G5083><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> looking for <S%G4327><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> of some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> have compassion, <S%G1653><s%> making a difference: <S%G1252><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> others <S%G3739><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> fear, <S%G5401><s%> pulling <S%G726><s%> them out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fire; <S%G4442><s%> hating <S%G3404><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> garment <S%G5509><s%> spotted <S%G4696><s%> by <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto him that is able <S%G1410><s%> to keep <S%G5442><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> from falling, <S%G679><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to present <S%G2476><s%> you faultless <S%G299><s%> before the presence <S%G2714><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> exceeding joy, <S%G20><s%>

To the only <S%G3441><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior, <S%G4990><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> majesty, <S%G3172><s%> dominion <S%G2904><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power, <S%G1849><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
